name: Dungeon Roll
description:
You are playing as the stone golem Kamen who is trying to escape from a strange rotating cave pushing levers, boxes and buttons.

Scripts by everyone

Level design by Mitnika

Art by Delyanskiiii

Music and SFX by Saskata

Every asset has been made during the jam.

https://coolors.co/454545-636566-808487-619f80-42ba79
